document.full_text: china's largest listed car distributor has come to the rescue of saab in a deal worth as much as 110 million euros, potentially staving off the collapse of one of sweden's best-known brands.
document.title: spyker turns to china's pangda for saab rescue
lines_and_colors: china's largest listed car distributor has come to the rescue of saab in a deal worth as much as 110 million euros, potentially staving off the collapse of one of sweden's best-known brands.
